Potat_Crash: Gil will probably find a way to profit from that giant sweet potato.. $s
Introduction: Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm Jil Harmon.#$e#My husband runs the Sweet Potato Mart here. And have you met my daughter, Abigail? She's the pale one with the purple hair.
Resort_Entering: Lannery gave us each a piece of his fish jerky. I'm still chewing on it.
Resort_Shore: The water is so warm here compared to the valley. It's really pleasant!
Resort_Bar: I told Bobby to surprise me, and he made an iced green tea with mango zest. How nice!$h
Resort: Hi @. Are you here to relax, or to do work?
Mon: I wish Abby wouldn't spend so much time in her room.
Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. Are you enjoying the married life? I hope so!
Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Spaceship. Don't tell Gil, he has jealousy issues even though we are divorced.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?
Tue: Gil and I are divorced.#$e#I could take his constant over-explaining things and all the whacky ideas, but him being arrested for tax fraud was too much for me
Wed: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?#$e#If not, Gil might be able to help you out.#$e#He carries a variety of useful items.
Thu: #$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... I wonder if I can get Gil to cook dinner tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
Fri: It's a fine-looking day.#$e#On days like this I like to help Evelyn with the public gardens.#$e#She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.
Sat: Is it just me, or does Abigail have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Abigail moved out...#$e#No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open!$h
Sat2: Gil is on house arrest because of The Incident
Sat4: Abby's always had a strange interest in extraterrestrial things. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I thought we would be happy here.#$e#Gil's a bit weird... but he's a good man. Sometimes I'm sad it didn't work out for us
Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
Wed6: Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.#$e#I'm glad that we've become friends.
summer_Mon: On Wednesdays the shop is closed.#$e#Keep that in mind if you're going to need anything.
summer_Tue: I've been seeing wild fruits in the forest lately.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
summer_Wed: Hi there. Can you go talk to Gil?#$e# He is lonely on house arrest#$e#I don't want to listen to his ramblings anymore.
summer_Sat: Is it just me, or does Abigail look a little pale?#$e#Maybe I'm just worrying about her too much.
summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's Abigail's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little colour in her cheeks.
summer_Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
summer_Wed6: Time seems to go by faster and faster the older you get...$s
fall_Mon: Fall is Abby's favourite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.
fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Abby was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...#$e#She's a free spirit, like I was before I met Gil. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm.
fall_Tue: I've seen edible mushrooms in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
fall_Sat: Is it just me, or does Abigail play too many video games?#$e#Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned.
fall_Wed6: You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.
winter_Tue: Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
winter_Fri: Even though it's cold, I still check on the public garden beds every now and then.#$e#I just want to make sure they aren't damaged too much before spring returns.
winter_Sat: You wonder why Abigail's hair is purple?#$e#Uhmâ€¦ I have no idea hehe.
winter_Wed6: Are you excited for the new year?#$e#I predict that you'll be super-successful on your farm.$h
